location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3278 of 1852, from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging Kemball's previous despatch (ff 248-56), and approving of its contents. Malet also writes that the Governor in Council presumes that Kemball has sufficiently stressed to Commodore Robinson that the Firman of the Porte empowering him to stop and search suspected vessels carrying the Ottoman flag is secret and confidential.
